snippet: The decision came as lawmakers criticized banks that were considering paying bonuses later than usual. The top tax rate in Britain is to drop to 45 percent, from 50 percent, on April 6.
abstract: The decision came as lawmakers criticized banks that were considering paying bonuses later than usual. The top tax rate in Britain is to drop to 45 percent, from 50 percent, on April 6.

headline.main: Goldman Retreats From Plan to Award Bonuses Later in Britain
headline.print_headline: Goldman Bonuses Won’t Be Timed to Ease a Tax
